name: Miss Doublefinger

trigger.text: DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): Play this card.

text: On Play: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck: Play this card.
